Changelog
=========

0.4 - 2010/04/19
----------------

* Register locales-directories [WouterVH]
* Pyflakes-cleanup [WouterVH]
* z3c.autoinclude plugin [naro]

0.3 - 2008/11/30
----------------

* Removed obsolete (and invalid) import_steps.xml


0.2 - 2008/11/30
----------------

* Fixed external rss title (may contain spaces now)


0.1 - 2008/11/29
----------------

* Initial release
